text: The Palmolive Building, formerly the Playboy Building, is a 37-story Art Deco building at 919 N. Michigan Avenue in Chicago. It was built by Holabird & Root. It was completed in 1929. It was home to the Colgate-Palmolive-Peet corporation. ==References== ==Other websites== * Palmolive Building Landmark Residences * Palmolive Building Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago Category:1929 establishments in Illinois
title: Palmolive Building
